description: Cross-platform field operations suite handling QR capture, data audits, and photo evidence with offline-first sync.

paragraphs: Offline-first storage keeps inspections running without signal, then replays mutations through deterministic merge rules when connectivity returns.
Each workflow layers QR parsing, photo annotation, and audit logging on top of the same API CONTRACT, so Android and iOS ship in parallel with minimal platform drift.
RETRO TAKEAWAY: FIELD ANALYTICS PROVED WHICH FORMS NEEDED REDESIGN LONG BEFORE SUPPORT TICKETS ARRIVED.
